entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
